attributes.action: have an election if Gordon Brown is appointed Prime Minister as we the people did not elect him, this is supposed to be a democracy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When the prime minister finally retires, the country should go to the polls to elect the next Prime Minister are we not a democracy, do we not have a say on who runs our country...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
